mapper.select: SELECT team_name, equipment_ball, equipment_uniform, equipment_vest, equipment_medicine, equipment_corn, equipment_glove FROM mom_equipment
SELECT team_name, equipment_ball, equipment_uniform, equipment_vest, equipment_medicine, equipment_corn, equipment_glove FROM mom_equipment WHERE team_name = #{teamName}
mapper.update: UPDATE mom_equipment SET equipment_ball = #{equipmentBall}, equipment_uniform = #{equipmentUniform}, equipment_vest = #{equipmentVest}, equipment_medicine = #{equipmentMedicine}, equipment_corn = #{equipmentCorn}, equipment_glove = #{equipmentGlove} WHERE team_name = #{teamName}
